content:
Yinghao MA (马英浩) is a senior student of School of Mathematical Science, PKU, majoring Mathematics and Probability Theory. His research interests include Music Information Retrieval, Audio Signal Process, Machine Learning and Probability Theory. His goal is to deepen human understanding of auditory signals with information technology, especially music. Besides, he is one of the student conductors of Chinese philharmonic Orchestra, Chinese Music Institute at Peking University (see at Facebook).
He is also an advocate of affirmative action including the right of person with disability, of LGBTQ, of the poor and people in different race etc. He organizes volunteer teaching to the poor and carry out publicity activities on rare diseases in youth volunteer association and student union at School of Mathematical Science.

title: 马英浩(Nicolaus) Yinghao MA
